metatags.twitter:title: The Biggest Lie Paris Hilton Told The World About Britney Spears - Nicki Swift
metatags.og:title: The Biggest Lie Paris Hilton Told The World About Britney Spears - Nicki Swift
metatags.og:description: When was the first selfie taken? Well, according to socialite Paris Hilton, that would be November 2006, when she and pop star Britney Spears smiled together for a quick photo. Fourteen years later, however, fans are questioning whether Hilton's bold proclamation about the two "legends" holds true.
metatags.article:author: L.C.
